transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Sir good morning, Anurag baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji?
Executive: Sir Anurag baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se good morning wo aapka kal sir aake phone aaya tha na to kuch ho gayi thi to sir discuss ho gaya tha uske bare mein jo deal tha customer deal sir to hua hai
Customer: Lekin wo maan paye ki nahi maan paye ye baat hai discuss to hua bata bhi diya usko maine.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Par wo maan paye ki nahi maan paye ye wali baat hai.
Executive: Nahi wo sir nahi actually kya tha na sir ye pehle lagbhag ek do saal pehle hota tha ki client ko hum na IndiaMART ka koi bhi payment link send karte the to waha se wo payment bhi karta tha but abhi kya hai na ki baad mein cheeze band ho gayi hai to abhi isme aapko matlab samne se client se khud hi discuss karna padega.
Customer: Maine usko bol diya maine kaha hamara naam verify IndiaMART se kar lo baki naam ke usi naam ke khate mein paise dal do.
Executive: Theek hai baki sir main ye puch raha tha ki abhi jo aapka matlab jo site chal rahi hai is time headlock mein usme kafi dher sare product jo hai usme kuch pricing ya photos wagera bhi add nahi kiya hua tha. Shayad mere hisab se last time bhi iske regarding baat hui thi to aapne bola tha ki kisi din time nikal ke ise karte hain. To agar aap bata sako to main kar du.
Customer: Kya kare?
Executive: Isme aapko lagbhag 14 item aise hain jinme pricing hi nahi hai aap jaise deal bhi aap kar rahe ho isme aapka semi ka automatic washing machine ho gaya matlab aapne naam add kar diya hai but iski na price add nahi hai photo add nahi hai matlab kuch bhi ekdam blank pada hua hai aur iski wajah se mere khyal se iski lead aapko nahi mil rahi hai solar battery ka ho gaya aur aapka jo tata solar plant ka ho gaya.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai to inki aapke paas leads wagera hai wo aa nahi rahi hai to agar aap mujhe bata do haan haan isko isko main add kar deta hu baki wo jo client hai wo kahan ka tha waise kis location ka?
Customer: Saharanpur ka hai.
Executive: Sir sir wo to paas ka hi hai to aap use ek bar time de sakte ho matlab bol do ki aap mere shop pe aa jao yahan se aap.
Customer: Nahi paas nahi hai dur hai Saharanpur.
Executive: Achcha theek hai koi nahi nahi actually kya tha na ki wo main aapka kal call miss kar gaya tha na to iske regarding ek ticket raise ho gayi thi hamare end pe.
Customer: Nahi nahi baat to ho gayi unse aap chaho to aap bhi baat kar sakte ho online hai available wo aadmi.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir baat ye hai IndiaMART ka hi customer tha.
Executive: Achcha sir sir wo theek hai lekin customer se hamari baat nahi ho sakti na sir agar deal kharab hui to sir usme fir aapka bhi loss hai hamara bhi loss hoga. Theek hai to client se chalne do sir chalne do fir usko wo jaise kehta hai fir dekh.
Executive: Aur sir kya hota hai na sir customer se kaise aap matlab pricing wagera sir jo negotiation wagera hota hai wo sir aap hi kar sakte ho usme. Theek hai to wo to maine kar li baat usse.
Executive: Theek hai isme to main kuch khas interfere nahi karunga sir ek cheez aur dekhna tha aap wo to IndiaMART ki link mang raha na keval payment ke liye ki bhai maal mera mein pahuncha ki nahi pahuncha us cheez ke liye chahiye tha usko IndiaMART ka link.
Executive: To nahi usko bol do ki agar aap bhi deal karte ho IndiaMART se to aapko pata hi hoga ki abhi IndiaMART ke through len den nahi hota jitne bhi client customer se hota hai IndiaMART ke payment ke through aapka koi bhi len den nahi hota theek hai jo bhi transaction wagera hota hai na IndiaMART usme interfere nahi karta haan agar transaction hone ke baad kuch agar conflict hota hai to usme aapki matlab bilkul help karenge hum theek hai to thoda sa ye thoda sa janna tha do cheeze aur ye aapke d rank mein available hai teen aapke product hai ek aapka solar inverter hai ek aapka rechargeable lithium battery hai ek aapka phosphate battery hai to ye teeno aap lead consume kar rahe ho na iski.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Haan to bas isko aapki apni category mein add nahi kiya hua hai catalog mein isko in teeno ko.
Customer: Yaar nahi kiya hua.
Executive: Nahi ye matlab ye teeno aap matlab main abhi dekh raha tha bhai aap matlab iski lead aap consume to kar rahe ho definitely achi khasi lead iski aa rahi hai aapne paanch 10 lead iski use kari hui hai but aapki ye catalog mein hi add nahi hai to isse kya hota hai ki fir dheere dheere iski leads aapke paas aani kam ho jati hai aap matlab use to karte rahoge but koi bhi customer aapke waha se dekh nahi payega isme kya cheeze available hai kya nahi. Theek hai to agar aap add kar dunga usko.
Executive: Agar aapke paas abhi nahi agar main iska add kar de raha hu bas iska na photos aur wo jo hai pricing bata do mujhe matlab jo prices ki hai to prices to different model ke alag alag aate hain.
Executive: Achcha nahi matlab ye teen teeno ka alag alag hai teeno ka matlab ye rechargeable ka ho gaya UTL ka ho gaya.
Customer: Haan aur rechargeable mein bhi bahut sare AH ki battery alag alag aati hai to 100 AH ki hai 24 volt mein 100 AH ki hai 12 volt mein to 100 AH ki 48 volt mein isliye thoda sa confusion rehta hai ki add karu to kaun si wali add kar du.
Executive: Sir sare add kar do dekho aapke paas lagbhag char lagbhag aap kam se kam char se 500 ya lagbhag aap 1000 plus items add kar sakte ho isme theek hai to agar aapke paas available hai sare product to aap sare add karo usme kya ja raha hai isse jitni jyada items hongi aapke paas utne jyada calls or inquiries ka flow badhega. Theek hai to agar haan agar aap item ka jo count rahega agar aap wahi kam rakhoge na to to usme bhi thoda sa issue hoti hai agar aap hamare kuch aise clients hai jinhone sirf char se paanch items add kar rakhe hai aur baad mein kehte hai ki hamare paas calls ka flow nahi aa raha to sir isme bhi concern hota hai theek hai baki haan chalo badha denge isko.
Executive: Theek hai isko dekh lete hai baki sir ek kaam ye kar raha hu aapka jo ticket raise ho gaya tha isko main close kar de raha hu yahan se theek hai aapke paas ek feedback ka message jayega uska verify kar dijiyega theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's products lack pricing and photos.

- Customer is not receiving leads.

- Customer wants IndiaMART payment link.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to add missing details.

- Executive clarified IndiaMART payment policies.

- Executive closed the raised ticket.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will receive a feedback message.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- pricing, leads, catalog, payment link
